titlestmt.title: Collection List for the Victoria University Library, Toronto

publicationstmt.publisher: Victoria University Library, University of Toronto
Published by and available from the William Blake Archive, http://www.blakearchive.org

availability.p: Â©2008 Morris Eaves, Robert N. Essick, Joseph Viscomi.

projectdesc.p: These collection lists were prepared for the William Blake Archive.

p.hi: All of the works listed here are in the E. J. Pratt Library; most were given to the Victoria University Library by G. E. Bentley, Jr., and Elizabeth Bentley in 2005. These gifts constitute the Bentley Collection at Victoria University. The "Blake" numbers following most entries are the equivalent of acquisition or call numbers. Some recent acquisitions had not been assigned a "Blake" number at the time this handlist was compiled.

div1.head: Illuminated Books
div1.bibl: The Marriage of Heaven and Hell, copy M (plates 25-27, "A Song of Liberty" only).Blake no. 394
